spinSizeCode:
<nz-spin nzSimple class="m-r-20 d-inline-block" [nzSize]="'small'"></nz-spin>
<nz-spin nzSimple class="m-r-20 d-inline-block"></nz-spin>
<nz-spin nzSimple class="m-r-20 d-inline-block" [nzSize]="'large'"></nz-spin>
spinCustomizeDescriptionCode:
<nz-spin nzTip='Loading...'>
    <nz-alert
        nzType="info"
        nzMessage="Alert message title"
        nzDescription="Further details about the context of this alert.">
    </nz-alert>
</nz-spin>
